long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is designed to assist students by automating the retrieval of important information from their school’s website. It opens the school website in a new tab, scrapes the necessary information such as class schedules and announcements, and stores this data locally. Additionally, it provides real-time notifications to keep users updated on any new information or changes. By using this extension, students can stay informed and organized without having to manually check the school website multiple times a day.
